# Call Faithful Servants (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Calling Spells|calling]]) \[[[Good Spells|good]]]

**Level:** [[Celestial (Domain)|Celestial 6]], [[6th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 6]], [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 12th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 12]], [[BoXM 10th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 minute

**Components:** V, S, Abstinence, Celestial

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Effect:** 1d4 lantern archons, coure eladrins, or musteval guardinals

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Book of Exalted Deeds (WotC), pg. 93

You call 1d4 lawful good lantern archons from Celestia, 1d4 chaotic good coure eladrins from Arborea, or 1d4 neutral good musteval guardinals from Elysium to your location. They serve you for up to one year as guards, soldiers, spies, or whatever other hol purpose you have.

No matter how many times you cast this spell, you can control no more than 2 HD worth of celestials per caster level. If you exceed this number, all the newlycalled creatures fall under your control, and any excess servants from previous castings return to their home plane.

*Abstinence Component:* The character must abstain from casting conjuration spells for 3 days prior to casting this spell.
